description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The ultimate nostalgic experience, Sketch recreates the toy you loved as a child and will love again on XBox 360.  Save up to four of your creations for future viewing and editing.
description.short: The ultimate nostalgic experience, Sketch recreates the toy you loved as a child and will love again on XBox 360.  Save up to four of your creations for future viewing and editing.
